name: Hiveswap Friendsim: Volume Thirteen
summary: Are you aware that most accidents happen in the home? It’s true. You’re just minding your own business, sitting in your living room, and BAM. A large chunk of ceiling falls on your head or a harpoon flies in through an open window. Provided you live near a lot of whale hunting. The point is, it kills you. You’re dead. Randomness abounds.
